# [Interview #979: Reddit AMA 2013, Entry #84](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=979#84)

#### [ShakaUVMÂ ()](http://www.reddit.com/r/Fantasy/comments/1ced7z/iamstilla_novelist_named_brandon_sanderson_ama/c9fpwkf#s)

Is
*Legion*
part of your Cosmere multiverse?

#### Brandon Sanderson

*Legion*
is not Cosmere. (Earth isn't part of it.)
